item.title: Needs removinv
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:32, topic:415295”]Because I love you demon
bump

Username: judostar
Age: 15
Time of coding: during the week about 1-2hours(after i’m done my homework) and weekend about 5-6hrs.
Experience of Coding: 6 months - a year.
Why you want to join: 562 custom, seems interesting
How many first projects have you made: lemme count, armscape, unreleased DerbyScape, unreleased iClarity based Project 05/06, currently working on armscape v2. So about 4 almost 5
What can you do best on coding: Npcs, fixing a few bugs, coding some skills, etc.(Don’t bug me to code herb, cause that’s the most pain in the ass skill to code)
Best coding skill (npc dialogue and stuff): Best thing I’ve coded so far is probably re-doing everything that some kid fucked up, (fucked up everything from npcs to some skills)
how much time u are free to help: weeknights 1-2hrs, weekends 5-6hrs.
Where do you live: Canada, GMT -5
(this is needed so i can tell on what time you are online, i need a team that can be online at the same time)
at what time can you be online (24hrs): anywhere on weekends from 8am-10am and on. On week nights, about 7/8pm(could change).
why do you like RSDW: I like that you can actually code, unlike some idiots who hire me and force me do to everything.
Your favotite versions (562, 508 ect.): normal 317, rsc, 474, I’m okay with 508/525 and I like 562s, 614s, 634s, etc. But I hate revisions loading higher cache like 317 loading 634 cache.

[/quote]

I AM VERRY SORRY!
the coding team for the 562 has bin aborted.
due to the fact that the v2.5 508 is now hosted and ready to play online.
the 6 of you who applied to help on the 562 are now being sent a PM with the abbility to send me an acc user and pass to become immidiate MODS.
once again im sorry but working on the online version is a bit more important now.
as MODS you will be asked to report any bugs or abnormalitys in the game so i can fix, also you will get a special trick to help me add npc dialogue by simply clicking on one thing, NO HARD WORK!
also when u are a MOD be sure to start your username with “MOD” (capital M, O and D)
the rest may be entered manualy.
also as MODS you will get new items and features before the other player get them or can do them in the game.
i will also add a special event at ur b-day, and as RuneScape there will be holiday events all around the game world.
i will add a command for players to suggest events or items.

Greetz DemonWars.
(once again I AM SORRY)

Read full topic

item.title: Needs removinv
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“DemonWars, post:1, topic:415295”]Greetings i am DemonWars.

You may know me from my latest release: RuneScape DemonWars v2 508 HD Custom

You need a E-mail adress to keep contact.
you also need to be able to run the server.
NEVER:
tell me your password related to RuneScape, email or this site.
if i choose you you will need to make a email adres with your moparscape name, so that no personal info can be leaked, and i can recognize u better
when selected you will get a PM where ill be asking you to make a new email for me to invite u on, i will use a new email for this team myself (for the 3 selected i will use my standard demonwars email adress)
NEVER PM ME WITH THE QUESTION TO JOIN!

To get a chance of entering you mus reply with this form:

Username: 
Age: 
Time of coding: 
Experience of Coding: 
Why you want to join: 
How many first projects have you made: 
What can you do best on coding: 
Best coding skill (npc dialogue and stuff): 
how much time u are free to help: 
Where do you live: 
(this is needed so i can tell on what time you are online, i need a team that can be online at the same time)
at what time can you be online (24hrs): 
why do you like RSDW: 
Your favotite versions (562, 508 ect.):

Please BE HONEST! if u lie you wont get any chance of being selected!

If you are a 562 coder and u can understand the basics, and you can help me with the following coding:

1: NPC Dialogue with 3 options.
2: NPC combat
3: NPC VS NPC Combat coding
4: Combat coding
5: magic coding
and all other stuff ill ask when i need help, but these are just basics there is just so much to do that i cant do it all that fast.

when this server will be released and put online u will also be MODs or as my ranks go “Demon Moderator”

u dont get this by telling me u will help, but instead u do nothing i asked you to do.

if u get chosen u will have to prove yourself, dont think you get nothing for being a mod.

when u get to be a MOD you will get the following things:

1: MOD status in game
2: A special transformation when in game, every mod gets his own transformation
this will have the following:
//1: minnions that will fite for u
//2: you can also transform into all other monsters exept the ones from other mods
//3: your transformation is unique, you are the only one who has it.
//4: a special atack!
3: spawn option for all stuff
4: ::jail command, this will not work on mods or me
5: ::tele command (also teletome and teleto)
6: ::copy command, this will give u the exact same armor and looks as the targeted player, this will not work on mods or me
7: a ::report command, this will send me a report message in game , when i will tele him and you to me for questioning (i always save conversations of all players to keep track of their dialogue)
8: a special MOD armour with your name, if u get aproved you may tell me what kind of armor u want
9: when in safe zone u can ask me for permission to “Demonize” this means that u get an attack option and all other players in the area too, and u may all battle (i will answer immidatly if possible)
10: u may hold drop partys anywhere u like!
11: u may ask me to come anytime u like, and if im not busy ill come and assist u or ill tele u to me.
12: SECRET
i will keep adding special stuff for mods, ill keep this updated.

(THIS IS NO ADVERTISMENT!!)

The higher of a rank you are the more u get.

I need 3 more mods at the moment.

I have: 4 Mods
(including the mods i already have)

Places left: 3
Users pending for entry: 3

[center][MOD]Tehjamdude
[MOD]Mod Alex - General Graador
[MOD]Erand (noobs are ftw) - K’ril trusoth
[MOD]Celeb holiday (pending)
[/center]

Greetz DemonWars[/quote]
ill help you out if you need it i am a really good 562 coder now i made a 317 load 562 maps,npc,666 items ect… now i am working on my own 562 from a basic 562 source

Read full topic

Why you want to join: Well I love to host and code servers, but due to a recent computer crash I no longer have the capability to host/code my own server. So I’m looking for a project in which the owner will be dedicated and I would love to help lead this server to greatness and hopefully, with enough hard work, become one of the best servers out there.

How many first projects have you made: More than 5

What can you do best on coding: Anything asked of me, create commands, new area’s, minigames, interfaces, anything you can think of

Best coding skill (npc dialogue and stuff): I am equally experienced in all assets of server Coding.

how much time u are free to help: Anytime you need me I’ll be readily available.
